website_summaries.verdict: A flexible saddle that's designed for comfort with the female anatomy in mind.
pros: Wide rear section provides targeted support
Center cut reduces pressure on soft-tissue while peddling
Has a gel layer in the padding for added comfort
cons: On the soft side, so it's not the best choice for long rides or cyclists who prefer firmer support

customer_reviews.title: loved it! My previous experience with Terry products was ...
customer_reviews.text: Day 1... loved it! My previous experience with Terry products was the bike shorts. I love them. However, I was stubborn and rode with my original Trek seat for miles/months in my training for RAGBRAI (bike ride across Iowa). Weeks before RAGBRAI, I met someone who had a Terry seat and said she loved it from the git-go as well. That day, I ordered this seat, received it and rode on it the first day 20 plus miles and loved it. We made it across Iowa as well (411 miles).
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S

customer_reviews.title: Soft, very soft
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy saddle at first, plusher than it looks. The gel is a nice touch. The surface is more slick than saddles I have had. The one issue I have is the 2 metal mounting rails are not completely parallel with the seat surface, so even if I max out the tilt on the seatpost, I still can't get the seat level, so there is tendency to slide forward a little. Feels great first 2 miles, the next 10 miles was uncomfortable. The saddle rubs on my legs and causes some chaffing on long rides.
customer_reviews.author: jmumv

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned and comfortable, pain-free rides
customer_reviews.text: After adjusting the seat position to fit my body, the ride was definitely better than when I was using the stock seat that came with my bike. Usually when I ride any distance I have swollen seat bones. Even just sitting on the old seat hurt. We went on a longer ride recently, and I had no discomfort at all. No discomfort during the ride or after. Finally, no swelling and no pain! I'm very pleased with this brand. I definitely recommend this seat, and would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: MrsK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a new road bike and is keeping the old bike. So that means a 2nd saddle so we got another Terry because that is the only saddle that has ever been comfortable for her. In short, she loves this model of the Terry saddle.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I like to do cycling tourism, 4 or more days cycling 50 kms/day at leisure pace, and regularly cycle this distance during the weekends to be fit for the trips. I was also trying to break the saddle that came with my new TREK 27'5 and was having a hard time... finally decide to buy the Terry saddle and I am very pleased with it. It is very comfortable and I am not sore anymore, at least for my use (no competitions!). My advice is to test and make small adjustments on the inclination until you find the perfect fit for your body.
customer_reviews.author: Lubia

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable saddle!  Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I’ve ridden thousands of miles and this is my favorite saddle. I bought this saddle for my trail bike and loved it. I recently bought the more expensive Terry Century butterfly saddle for my road bike and found it too hard. It’s a great saddle, but I like this one better. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable saddle for touring
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous buying this saddle, but it hasn't disappointed. It was comfortable riding with and without bike shorts. If I could go back, I'd probably buy the upgraded version of it, but this one will do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this seat for my wife because the Terry product line is designed for women and because of previous good results on another seat. It is a quality product and will hold up if maintained. There is never a one seat - fits all design. You have to test to see what works for you and you need to go on rides that are longer than a test ride.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Love my Terry!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Terry bike seat! No more pressure on my soft tissues. My sit bones no longer ache after a long ride. The seat is not squishy but firm, which is what you need for support. I'm so glad I bought this Terry seat. Makes my bike rides much more enjoyable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfy Seat
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd Butterfly gel seat purchase. I now have them on all my bikes. It's amazingly comfortable and perfectly shaped for performance and ease on sit bones.
customer_reviews.author: Lees

customer_reviews.title: ... require little "breaking in" when new and keep me comfortable over longer rides (50+ miles)
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Terry saddles for all 4 of my bikes - they require little "breaking in" when new and keep me comfortable over longer rides (50+ miles). I have not tried many different brands, but am happy enough with Terry that I don't feel the need to. Saddles are a very individual and specific thing - I recommend giving Terry saddles a try if you're looking for a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jen K.

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Received with product damaged. I wanted to try the comfort before return to see if i should get a replacement. It comfy but too small and wide for me. I need something a tiny but bigger and narrower. The search for a good saddle continues.
customer_reviews.author: T. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved this seat. I've been buying them since 1998?... and they are exactly what you need if you do a lot of climbing on your bike.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Really helps
customer_reviews.text: This seat made all the difference in the world for me. My rides would get so uncomfortable that I had a hard time enjoying them. I don't know what is behind the engineering of these seats , but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Saddle
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my wife and she has been very pleased with it. She says that it is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery S. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought one years ago!
customer_reviews.text: this is just what I have been looking for. No more men's bike seats for me. You can really feel the difference. No paid after long bike rides. I even bought a 2nd pair for my other bike.
customer_reviews.author: SUNNYINFLORIDA

customer_reviews.title: An awesome seat!
customer_reviews.text: An awesome seat!! I ride approximately 20-30 miles when I go. This seat is very comfortable especially on a long ride.
customer_reviews.author: Mymia18

customer_reviews.title: Seat was really comfortable once it was broken in
customer_reviews.text: Seat was really comfortable once it was broken in. I rode for 11 miles the other day and was not bothered at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Best bike seat ever, I've had it for years and it still feels great, whether it's 2 miles or 25 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It is still a great
customer_reviews.text: I just though being gel it would be softer but it's not. It is still a great saddle
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Great seat, good contour for the female rider.
customer_reviews.text: Turned my hour long hard bike rides into much more comfortable ones.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable seat I have tried. I have tried three different brands.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof4

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Great women's bike seat
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Great women's bike seat. Only ridden about 100 miles on it so far, but I love it.
customer_reviews.author: KT Morin

customer_reviews.title: Comfy seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable seat. I bought it for long mountain bike rides over rough terrain and was very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Alaska Sue

customer_reviews.title: It is so comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I put this seat on my bike that I have on my inside trainer. It is so comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aaahhhhhh...
customer_reviews.text: After trying to "break in" the saddle that came with my Trek, I gave up ordered this Terry saddle on a recommendation from a fellow cyclist. From day one, I haven't thought about my bum on any ride so far! It's great!
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: Nice comformatable saddle
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and very comfortartable. Good Quality saddle for the money a little heavy but food for endurance rides.
customer_reviews.author: Lenore Zahn

product_meta.title: Terry Butterfly Chromoly Women's Saddle
feature_bullets: RIDE WITH US: For over 30 years, we’ve been disrupting the bicycle industry – designing innovative bikes, saddles, apparel and accessories that fit mobilized women who believe their wheels are their wings. We are 100% dedicated to making cycling a more comfortable experience for all women.

TERRY’S PROMISE: Because we believe in the transformational power of cycling, we offer support for all kinds of cycling and are driven to one mission: Get more women riding bicycles—comfortably, safely and beautifully.
COVERFEATURES: Smooth, seamless top made of black synthetic Dura-tek, with textured leather rear accents; additional gel padding layer; Best-selling, sportfitness saddle designed for comfort & value

YOUR GUARANTEE: Ride it. Love it or Return it. We're proud of the products we sell and we back them unconditionally. If for any reason you're not completely satisfied with your Terry purchase, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
